articles.title: Two dead, two alive after Americans kidnapped in Mexico - BBC
articles.description: Two survivors are delivered back to the United States, after Mexico confirms the fatalities.
articles.content:
Media caption, Video shows the moment four Americans were kidnapped in Mexico
Two of the four Americans kidnapped at gunpoint in Mexico last week are dead and two are alive and now back in the US, M… [+3957 chars]

articles.author: Josh Campbell, Abel Alvarado, Karol Suarez, Caroll Alvarado, Eric Levenson
articles.title: 2 Americans kidnapped in Mexico found dead and 2 found alive, officials say - CNN
articles.description: Two of the four Americans kidnapped by armed gunmen in the Mexico border city of Matamoros on Friday were found dead and two were found alive on Tuesday, US and Mexican officials said.
articles.content:
Two of the four Americans kidnapped by armed gunmen in the Mexico border city of Matamoros on Friday were found dead and two were found alive on Tuesday, US and Mexican officials said.
